verbs.description: [ARG0: President Donald Trump] [V: announced] [ARGM-TMP: Saturday morning] [ARG1: that American prisoner Josh Holt has been released from prison in Venezuela] .
President Donald Trump announced Saturday morning that American prisoner Josh Holt [V: has] been released from prison in Venezuela .
President Donald Trump announced Saturday morning that American prisoner Josh Holt has [V: been] released from prison in Venezuela .
President Donald Trump announced Saturday morning that [ARG1: American prisoner Josh Holt] has been [V: released] [ARG2: from prison] [ARGM-LOC: in Venezuela] .
